description.p: The present invention relates to a system and method for wireless communication.
In recent years, wireless communication devices have become increasingly prevalent. There is a need for improved systems that can handle multiple device connections efficiently.
description.heading: BACKGROUND OF THE INVENTION
description.p: Conventional wireless systems suffer from various limitations when managing device connections.
description.heading: SUMMARY OF THE INVENTION
description.p: The present invention addresses these limitations by providing an improved connection management system.
